extendedInfo.description: If you are Calvin Harris's fan, this app is right for you. Whenever you want to check Calvin Harris's lyrics, just open this app and choose the lyrics that you want. You don't have to access the internet to get the lyrics. We provide all Calvin Harris's lyrics here. In the Album tab, you can choose lyrics based on the album. In All lyrics tab, all of Calvin Harris's lyrics are here. You can quickly search the lyrics by using the search bar at the top of the page.Hope you guy enjoy using this app as much as I enjoy developing it. :)-------------------------------- Main Features -------------------------------- - Lyrics categorized by album - Show all lyrics - Search lyrics-------------------------------- List of albums -------------------------------- - I Created Disco- Ready for the Weekend- 18 Months-------------------------------- List of lyrics -------------------------------- - Acceptable In The 80's- Blue- Bounce- Colours- Dance Wiv Me- Disco Heat- Drinking From The Bottle- Electro Man- Feel So Close- Flashback- Here 2 China- I Created Disco- I Need Your Love- I'm Not Alone- Iron- Let's Go- Limits- Merrymaking At My Place- Neon Rocks- Ready For The Weekend- Relax- Stars Come Out- Sweet Nothing- The Girls- The Rain- Thinking About You- This Is The Industry- Vegas- We Found Love- We'll Be Coming Back- Worst Day- Yeah Yeah Yeah La La La- You Used To Hold Me
